import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core' import { IMenuCafe } from '../../models/menuCafeInterface' @Component({ selector: 'app-menuCafe', templateUrl: './menuCafe.component.html' }) export class MenuCafe { ShowContent = false; @Input() Dishes!: IMenuCafe }
